member.name: T:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager
member.summary: Registers and manages interaction between elements marked as drag sources and drop targets and triggers the raising of appropriate events about drag-and-drop operation to the user.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.DragSourceProperty
member.summary: Identifies the attached property.

member.summary: Gets the value of the attached property from a given .
member.param: The object from which to read the property value.
member.returns: The value of the attached property.

member.summary: Sets value for attached property to a given .
member.param: The object on which to set attached property.

member.summary: Identifies the attached property.

member.summary: Gets the value of the attached property from a given .
member.param: The object from which to read the property value.
member.returns: The value of the attached property.

member.summary: Sets value for attached property to a given .
member.param: The object on which to set attached property.

member.name: M:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.EndDrag(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ends drag operation if there is drag operation in progress.
member.param: When is set ot true drag is canceled. When it is set to false it is considered that drop is performed.

member.name: M:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.RefreshDragLayout
member.summary: Ensure that dragged item is on the top of layout. User can use this method to set dragged item as top most popup if there are other popups that are created after drag is already initiated.

member.name: M:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.GetDropTargets(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Gets the drop targets with the specified channels match.
member.returns: The drop targets where at least one drop channel matches with one of the passed channels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.CurrentCopyCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets data template that will be used for copy cursor when copy operation is performed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.CurrentCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets data template that is currently in usage as a mouse cursor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.CurrentDragTemplate
member.summary: Gets data template that will be applied to dragged item when drag-and-drop operation starts.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.CurrentDropNotAllowedCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets data template that will be used for drop operation not allowed cursor if during drag-and-drop operation there is not found appropriate drop target.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.CurrentMoveCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets data template that will be used for move cursor during drag-and-drop operation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.DragPopup
member.summary: Gets the UI element used to display dragged item on the screen.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.IsDragging
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop operation is currently in progress.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.HighlightTargetsOnDragStart
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drop target elements should be highlighted when drag source element with appropriate is dragged.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.Instance
member.summary: Gets the single instance of DragDropManager class

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropManager.CursorPopup
member.summary: Gets most top UI element where cursor data templates are applied.

member.name: T:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragObject
member.summary: This class is intended to be used from the drag-and-drop framework only. There is no need for the user to create the instance of this class.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragObject.Data
member.summary: Gets the object that represents dragged data. This object can be specified by setting or properties.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragObject.DragImage
member.summary: Gets the image that represents the snapshot of the UIElement that initiate drag-and-drop operation.

member.name: T:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource
member.summary: This class is used to manage how element marked as a drag source behaves to. Element is marked as drag source as attached property is set to instance of class.

member.name: M:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.CopyCursorTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DataObjectProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragChannelsProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DropNotAllowedCursorTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.IsDraggableProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.MoveCursorTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.AssociatedObject
member.summary: Gets the UIElement associated with this object.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.CopyCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template used as a cursor while copy operation is performed during drag-and-drop operation. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DataObject
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that hold the meaningful for the drag-and-drop operation data.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragChannels
member.summary: Gets or sets the channels that object can be dragged into. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DraggingOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the drag mouse offset after which dragging is initiated. The default and minimal value is 2 pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets data template used by dragged element while drag-and-drop operation is performed. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DropNotAllowedCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template used as a cursor if there drop target is not found during drag-and-drop operation. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.FindDropTargetMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the find drop target mode.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.IsDraggable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether marked element can be dragged. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.MoveCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template used as a cursor during regular drag-and-drop operation. This is a dependency property.

member.name: E:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragCancel
member.summary: Occurs when drag-and-drop operation is canceled when is set to true in some of event handlers for or events or when method is called with dragCancel set to true.

member.name: E:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragEnd
member.summary: Occurs at the very end of the drag-and-drop operation. This is the last event that is raised while drag-and-drop is performed.

member.name: E:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragEnter
member.summary: Occurs when mouse pointer enter into UIElement marked as drop target while drag-and-drop is in progress. This event is cancelable.

member.name: E:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragLeave
member.summary: Occurs when mouse pointer leaves the boundaries of the UIElement marked as drop target while drag-and-drop operation is in progress.

member.name: E:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragOver
member.summary: Occurs when mouse pointer is moving over UIElement marked as drop target while drag-and-drop operation is in progress. This event occurs after event is raised.

member.name: E:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.DragStart
member.summary: Occurs when UIElement marked as draggable initiate drag operation. This event is cancelable.

member.name: E:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragSource.Drop
member.summary: Occurs when mouse is released while drag-and-drop operation is in progress, mouse pointer is over UIElement marked as drop target and drag channels of the drag source matches the drop channels of the drop target.

member.name: T:Infragistics.DragDrop.BindingContext
member.summary: This class is used to make possible to be bound.

member.name: T:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget
member.summary: This class is used to manage how element marked as a drop target behaves to. Element is marked as drop target as attached property is set to instance of class.

member.name: M:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.DropChannelsProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.DropTargetStyleProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.IsDropTargetProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: M:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.HighlightDropTarget(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Highlights the drop target as apply to the .
member.param: if set to true the specified style is set to the drop target element, otherwise the style is reverted to its original value.
member.returns: true when the drop target element can be highlighted.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.AssociatedObject
member.summary: Gets the UIElement associated with this object.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.DropChannels
member.summary: Gets or sets the channels that drop target is listening to. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.DropTargetMarkerBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used to fill shape that marks the drop target. The default brush color is Transparent. This property is relevant just when is null. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.DropTargetStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets style used by the drop target when dragged item is over it. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.IsDropTarget
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether marked element can be drop target. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropTarget.HighlightOnDragStart
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drop target element should be highlighted when drag source element with appropriate is dragged.

member.name: T:Infragistics.DragDrop.OperationType
member.summary: Describes the operation that can be performed against the dragged object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.OperationType.DropNotAllowed
member.summary: Initiated drop operation cannot be completed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.OperationType.Copy
member.summary: The dragged element can be copied.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.OperationType.Move
member.summary: The dragged element can be moved.

member.name: T:Infragistics.DragDrop.FindDropTargetMode
member.summary: Describes the way instance finds the appropriate instance.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.FindDropTargetMode.TopMostMatchedChannelTarget
member.summary: In order to be found the instance just needs to have the same channel as the instance.

member.name: F:Infragistics.DragDrop.FindDropTargetMode.TopMostTargetOnly
member.summary: In order to be found the instance has to be attached to top most drop target element. If there is no match found between of the top most drop target and of the drag source then is assumed that there is no valid drop target.

member.name: T:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs
member.summary: This class is a base class for all event arguments for events raised by objects.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.CopyCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template that will be used as cursor when coping operation is performed during dragging.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance of the object that represents the dragged data.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.DragSource
member.summary: Gets the UIElement that initiates drag operation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.DragTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template that will be applied to dragged element representation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.DropNotAllowedCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template that will be used as cursor when drag operation is performed but drop dragged item is not over appropriate target.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.DropTarget
member.summary: Gets the instance of the object marked as drop target.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.MoveCursorTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the data template that will be used as cursor when item is draged over appropriate drop target.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.OperationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of intended action during drag-and-drop operation. Setting this property will enforce the applying of related cursor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.OriginalDragSource
member.summary: Gets the original reporting source as determined by pure hit testing.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DragDropEventArgs.CustomMouseHolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the suggested by consumer of the event as the element which has to capture the mouse during the drag-drop.

member.summary: Event argumens for event of the .

member.returns: The x- and y-coordinates of the mouse pointer position relative to the specified object.

member.summary: Event arguments for event.

member.name: P:Infragistics.DragDrop.DropEventArgs.DropTargetElements
member.summary: Gets the collection of visual childs of drop target over which the dragged item is dropped.

member.summary: This class make possible the drag or drop channels to be set as a string containing the comma separated names of the channels.
